name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in building high-performance applications using **Java**, **Go**, and modern **JavaScript**/ **TypeScript** frameworks such as **Angular**. I bring extensive knowledge in developing robust solutions leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and database management with **Oracle** and **SQL**. My technical skill set includes proficiency in software design and performance testing tools like **JMeter**.

Furthermore, my background includes working with microservices architecture and CI/CD practices, which enables me to deliver secure and scalable applications tailored to meet evolving business needs. I have a solid understanding of networking principles and can integrate cloud services effectively. I pride myself on my capacity to bridge technology and business requirements, ensuring projects are completed with a focus on quality and compliance.
